title: Crystal Palace transfer news: Newcastle in talks over a swap deal involving Andros Townsend and Chancel Mbemba

organizations.name: crystal palace driving ban premier league

text:
TOON CHANCE ARM Crystal Palace transfer news: Newcastle in talks over a swap deal involving Andros Townsend and Chancel Mbemba 
Toon are looking to add firepower while Sam Allardyce is busy strengthening his defence for survival bid By JAMIE GORDON 
Rafa Benitez is keen to add more firepower to ensure high-flying Toon secure an immediate Premier League return. Getty Images 3 Andros Townsend left Newcastle for Palace in 2016 but could be heading back 
Catch up on all the latest transfer news, gossip and rumours with our live blog 
And SkySports claim the clubs are considering using Mbemba as a sweetener to try and bring Townsend back to the club before the transfer window slams shut tomorrow. 
The winger, 25, joined Palace in a £13million deal last year and Allardyce does not want to sell him while involved in a survival scrap – especially if Wilfried Zaha joins Tottenham. Getty Images Mbemba has not featured for Newcastle since October and is currently on DR Congo duty Reuters 3 Townsend has not enjoyed the best of times at Palace, where he has just one league goal 
But Benitez could offer Mbemba, 22, on loan to try and get a deal over the line, with Toon strong at centre-back. 
He is yet to return from African Nations Cup duty with DR Congo and has not played since October. Related Stories andros talks end Crystal Palace want to sell Andros Townsend back to Newcastle but talks break down as Toon want loan Andros Toonsend Palace winger Andros Townsend wants to return to Newcastle just six months after they sold him GET OUTA TOWN Andros Townsend in-line to make shock return to Newcastle from Crystal Palace DRIVING BAN Premier League player Andros Townsend banned from driving for six months after speeding rap KARL MARKED Chelsea to make £8m move for Newcastle keeper Karl Darlow if they miss out on Craig Gordon 
Palace have already taken Chris Samba on trial and are set to land Patrick van Aanholt in a clear indication of their priorities this window. 
The Eagles currently sit in 18th place – two points from Swansea and safety. Andros Townsend hits the post for Crystal Palace against Burnley
